00133 #define NILOGLEVEL_INFO     5
00134 #define NILOGLEVEL_WARNING  3
00135 #define NILOGLEVEL_ERROR    1
00136 
00144 extern NSInteger NIMaxLogLevel;
00145 
00152 #ifdef DEBUG
00153 #define NIDPRINT(xx, ...)  NSLog(@"%s(%d): " xx, __PRENIY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00154 #else
00155 #define NIDPRINT(xx, ...)  ((void)0)
00156 #endif // #ifdef DEBUG
00157 
00161 #define NIDPRINTMETHODNAME() NIDPRINT(@"%s", __PRENIY_FUNCTION__)
00162 
00169 #ifdef DEBUG
00170 
00171 #import <TargetConditionals.h>
00172 
00173 #if TARGET_IPHONE_SIMULATOR
00174 int NIIsInDebugger();
00175 // We leave the __asm__ in this macro so that when a break occurs, we don't have to step out of
00176 // a "breakInDebugger" function.
00177 #define NIDASSERT(xx) { if (!(xx)) { NIDPRINT(@"NIDASSERT failed: %s", #xx); \
00178 if (NIIsInDebugger()) { __asm__("int $3\n" : : ); }; } \
00179 } ((void)0)
00180 #else
00181 #define NIDASSERT(xx) { if (!(xx)) { NIDPRINT(@"NIDASSERT failed: %s", #xx); } } ((void)0)
00182 #endif // #if TARGET_IPHONE_SIMULATOR
00183 
00184 #else
00185 #define NIDASSERT(xx) ((void)0)
00186 #endif // #ifdef DEBUG
00187 
00188 #ifdef DEBUG
00189 #define NIDCONDITIONLOG(condition, xx, ...) { if ((condition)) { NIDPRINT(xx, ##__VA_ARGS__); } \
00190 } ((void)0)
00191 #else
00192 #define NIDCONDITIONLOG(condition, xx, ...) ((void)0)
00193 #endif // #ifdef DEBUG
00194 
00195 
00196 #pragma mark Level-Based Loggers
00197 
00206 #define NIDERROR(xx, ...)  NIDCONDITIONLOG((NILOGLEVEL_ERROR <= NIMaxLogLevel), xx, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00207 
00211 #define NIDWARNING(xx, ...)  NIDCONDITIONLOG((NILOGLEVEL_WARNING <= NIMaxLogLevel), \
00212                                              xx, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00213 
00217 #define NIDINFO(xx, ...)  NIDCONDITIONLOG((NILOGLEVEL_INFO <= NIMaxLogLevel), xx, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00218 // End of Level-Based Loggers
